<<<<<<< HEAD
An answer to the pretended refutation of Dr. Olyphant's defence
14 p.
Printed by J.W. for Thomas Carruthers, and sold at his shop in the Parliament Closs, Edinburgh : M.DC.XC.IX. [1699]
Discusses the use of vomiting and purging for the cure of fevers. Probably written in response to the anonymous pamphlet "A refutation of Dr Olyphant's defence" also printed in Edinburgh in 1699. Imperfect: tightly bound with some loss of text. Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
=======
